SuperstitioMod:SexDamage.NAME: Sex
SuperstitioMod:SexDamage.DESCRIPTION: If the target is the player: only deals half damage. NL If the target is not the player: after breaking Block, deals only 1 damage, with the remaining damage applied at the start of the target's next turn.

SuperstitioMod:UnBlockAbleDamage.NAME: Unblockable Damage
SuperstitioMod:UnBlockAbleDamage.DESCRIPTION: Cannot be blocked, does not trigger Thorns, ignores temporary HP.
